introduction: A collection of fourteen award winning animated short films including "Moonshadow," "The Last Cartoon Man," "Closed Mondays," and "Cosmic Cartoon".Loren Bowie	...	 animator: "A Short History of the Wheel"Randy Cartwright	...	 animator: "Room and Board"Ian Emes	...	 animator: "French Windows"Eric Ladd	...	 animator: "Cosmic Cartoon"Steven Lisberger	...	 animator: "Cosmic Cartoon"Marv Newland	...	 animator: "Bambi Meets Godzilla"Kathy Rose	...	 animator: "Mirror People"Will Vinton	...	 animator: "Closed Mondays" and "Mountain Music"
